abstract: The platform, called Telemundo Plus, will allow advertisers to promote products in Spanish or English on NBCUniversal, Comcast and Telemundo networks.
snippet: The platform, called Telemundo Plus, will allow advertisers to promote products in Spanish or English on NBCUniversal, Comcast and Telemundo networks.
lead_paragraph: In a move to increase its reach with both English- and Spanish-speaking Hispanic consumers, Telemundo Media will announce on Monday a new advertising platform in conjunction with Comcast Spotlight, an advertising unit of Comcast. The initiative will be called Telemundo Plus and will allow advertisers to show ads in either language throughout the NBCUniversal, Comcast and Telemundo networks.

headline.main: Telemundo Media to Offer Bilingual Approach to Advertisers
headline.print_headline: An Advertising Initiative With Bilingual Appeal
